# padlocdev

## Installation

You can install the development version of padlocdev from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("leightonpayne/padlocdev")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(padlocdev)
```
